mapper.insert: insert into article (name, title, message, image, html, look, love, time, deleted) values (#{name}, #{title}, #{message}, #{image}, #{html}, #{look}, #{love}, #{time}, #{deleted})
mapper.update: update article set name = #{name}, title = #{title}, message = #{message}, image = #{image}, html = #{html} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, a.title, a.message, date_format(a.time, '%Y-%m') as month, group_concat(b.title separator '::') as books, a.time from article a left join relationship r on r.article = a.id left join book b on b.id = r.book where a.deleted = #{deleted} and a.id > 10 group by a.id order by a.time desc;
select date_format(time, '%Y-%m') time from article where deleted = #{deleted} and id > 10 group by date_format(time, '%Y-%m') order by time desc;

select a.id, a.name, a.image, a.title, a.message, a.html, a.look, a.love, a.time, group_concat(b.title separator '::') as books from article a left join relationship r on r.article = a.id left join book b on b.id = r.book where a.deleted = #{deleted} and a.id > 10 group by a.id order by a.time desc
